parameters: This is a wholesome research facility.

I've gone bankrupt, what should I do from tomorrow... I've
only been working at the reception for so many years.
Entry is prohibited beyond this point.

This is a raid from the guild!! We've heard you're
conducting suspicious research! Move it!!

Tch! Have I been sniffed out already?! But I can't let you
through here!
We can't allow evil research! Let's take them down!
Don't underestimate us! Eat this, our very own creation!
Damn it! You'll pay for this!!
There's a fridge here! I wonder if there's anything inside~

You can't just open it without permission! You'll get in
trouble-!!
You obtained a fish paste tube!

This fridge, it's still full of fish paste tubes... this is
kind of scary.
There's a fridge here! I wonder if there's anything inside~

You shouldn't just open it without permission! You'll get in
trouble-!!
You obtained a fish paste tube!

This fridge... it's still full of fish paste tubes... this
is kind of scary.
There's a fridge! I wonder if there's anything inside~

You shouldn't just open it without permission! You'll get
scolded-!!

This fridge... it's still packed with fish paste tubes...
what's this, it's kind of scary.
There's a fridge here! I wonder if there's anything inside~

You can't just open it without permission! You'll get in
trouble-!!
There's nothing but fish paste tubes!!!!
You obtained a fish paste tube!

This fridge... it's still full of fish paste tubes... what's
this, it's kind of scary.
